# load libraries, set directories

```{r}
#| warning: false

library(SingleCellExperiment)
library(scRNAseq)

processed_dir <- "data/processed"
```

# look for datasets

```{r}
ld <- listDatasets()
```

# load a random dataset

```{r}
sce <- AztekinTailData()
```

# save the dataset

```{r}
saveRDS(sce, file.path(processed_dir, "sce-LC026-unprocessed.rds"))
```

```{r}
sessionInfo()
```
